::Prowl/Bloodystrike/Reptilica::

Prowl looks ahead as Iron Raptor begins to walk, beginning to feel 
undazed, and a bit ashamed at the same time. It had been pretty stupid 
to crash into that branch.. And to try to transform afterwords, too. 
But he had been a bit dazed.

Prowl narrows his eyes. He would be more careful in the future.

"I'm fine, let's hurry. This could be important," he says to Iron 
Raptor, his repair systems working.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bloodystrike's eyes travel over Desmonus' body as she stretches, 
Reptilica's doing the same thing as the bot stands up. Bloodystrike 
nods.

"Yeah, I'm fine," he says, glancing at Reptilica with an annoyed look 
on his face as the other says that he's fine too.

"I'm BloodyStrike," BloodyStrike says to Desmonus, stretching out his 
hand for a hand shake.

"Name's Reptilica," Reptilica quickly adds after BloodyStrike, pushing 
his friend's hand out of the way and offering his own. Bloodystrike 
growls.

"Reptilica has cleaning duty though, in the... Er... The CR chambers. 
He has to leave now."

Reptilica shakes his head, narrowing his eyes at BloodyStrike, "I 
don't have cleaning duty! And the CRs arn't connected to this section, 
you idiot."

Reptilica and BloodyStrike were two of the few bots who knew the 
Alliance base inside and out, other than Zardus. They had helped build 
it, and had supplied many of the materials from their own base.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> IR:
> 
> * Iron Raptor watched as prowl transformed, but knew that it was 
useless. 
> His wing was bronken and as disoriented as Prowl was, he should have 
at 
> least known that.
> She simply stands there and watches him transform back into robot 
mode, 
> simply shaking her head and stepping a bit closer as he falls to his 
knees, 
> lowering her head sne nudging him with her snout.
> Prowl wasn't looking well and she knew that he would be a while to 
repair, 
> but by the time they got to the Ark he should be fine.
> 
> But she stands still while Prowl gets up and climbs up on her back, 
shifting 
> her body to get use to the new weight. It wasn't much and it 
wouldn't slow 
> her down, not a problem.
> Iron Raptor then beginst to move out of the forst and towards the 
plain 
> again, taking the long way to the Ark.
> She would walk a bit while Prowl repaired a bit, making sure not to 
jar him 
> into pain or anything.*
> 
> " Now, Get repaired."
> 
> Desmonus:
> 
> * Desmonus coughed a bit as she sat up, the strike against the wall 
not 
> really being what she would call the perfect ride.
> She flapped her wings a few times to settle them before she got to 
her feet, 
> steadying herself against the wall as the base stablized.
> Brushing herself off she hardly noticed as BloodyStrike got to his 
feet and 
> looked her over, stretching a bit to work out the kinks in her 
stressed 
> gears.
> This day was getting worse every moment.
> First starvation and now a head on colision with a pair of bots.
> Perfect.
> Desmonus looks up  in a bit of surprise as she hears BloodyStrike 
speak, 
> looking him over a bit and straightening her stance.
> Her amber optics narrowed before her senses cought the small of his 
mech 
> fluid.
> She remembered that scent...but from where.
